Test Steps:
1. Open Postman and create a new POST request.
2. Set Method to POST in the request.
3. Choose POST from the dropdown menu next to the URL input field.
4. Enter the Endpoint URL: https://api.escuelajs.co/api/v1/users
5.Go to the "Body" tab below the URL bar and select "Raw".
6.Enter the following JSON body in the Body section:
{
  "name": "sara test",
  "email": "sara.test@test.com",
  "password": "123456",
  "avatar": "https://i.pravatar.cc/200"
}
